{{Lang|'''Yae Miko'''{{Name Order|Japanese}}|ja=八重神子|ja_rm=Yae Miko}}, also known as {{Lang|'''Guuji Yae'''|ja=宮司|ja_rm=Guuji}} or the '''Guuji''', is a playable {{Electro}} [[character]] in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

A kitsune of many facets, Yae Miko oversees the [[Grand Narukami Shrine (Subarea)|Grand Narukami Shrine]], owns the [[Yae Publishing House]], and is [[Raiden Shogun|Eternity]]'s servant and friend.
